author: Anonym
title: According to the National Bureau of Statistics, women account for more than 40% of the total employment in China, and they are widely involved in the decision-making and management of enterprises - Teller Report
text: China News Service, Beijing, December 12 (Reporter Wang Enbo) According to a report released by China's National Bureau of Statistics on December 31, the proportion of women in China's total social employment has stabilized at more than 12%, women's employment rights and interests have been effectively protected, and women have widely participated in enterprise decision-making and management. According to the 2022 Statistical Monitoring Report on the Development of Chinese Women (2021-2030) released by the National Bureau of Statistics on the same day, in 2022, there will be 3 million female employed persons in the country, accounting for 2.43% of all employed persons. Among the employed persons in urban non-private units, 2.6766 million were women, accounting for 4.40 percent. Labor protection and health protection for female employees have been strengthened. In 2022, 72.9% of enterprises implemented the Special Provisions on Labor Protection for Female Employees; The occupational health literacy level of female employees was 53.3%, 1.1 percentage points higher than that of men. The report also points out that women are widely involved in business decision-making. In 2022, 37.1% of employees and directors of enterprises were women; The proportion of women among employee supervisors was 40.8%, an increase of 2021.0 percentage points from 3. The proportion of women in the workers' congress of enterprises is 30.3%. In terms of women's social security, the coverage of maternity insurance, unemployment and work-related injury insurance for women has been expanding. At the end of 2022, the number of women participating in maternity insurance was 1 million, an increase of 08.2021 million from the end of 325, the number of women participating in unemployment insurance was 3.9949 million, an increase of 2.132 million, and the number of women participating in work-related injury insurance was 7 million, an increase of 1.12 million. With the further improvement of the popularization of higher education, the right of women in China to receive higher education has been strongly guaranteed. According to the report, in 2022, there were 2903.3 million female students enrolled in higher education, an increase of 2021.122 million from 5, accounting for 50.0% of the enrolled students, with a balanced ratio of men and women. Among them, 187.1 million were female graduate students, accounting for 51.2% of all graduate students. (ENDS)

author: Telefe Rosario
title: Barrio Belgrano: avanza el recambio de luminarias - Telefe Rosario
text: La Municipalidad de Rosario, a través de la Dirección General de Alumbrado Público dependiente de la Secretaría de Ambiente y Espacio Público, avanza con el recambio de luminarias con tecnología led en el sector comprendido por las avenidas Eva Perón y Provincias Unidas, Juan Pablo II (colectora de Circunvalación) y Mendoza, en el distrito Noroeste. En total se colocarán más de 500 luminarias led con sistema de telegestión. La tecnología led se destaca por proporcionar un ahorro energético por cada unidad instalada del 40%, permitiendo una utilización más eficaz de la energía. Además, el uso de tecnología led disminuye la contaminación y sienta las bases operativas para el desarrollo de una ciudad inteligente, permitiendo mayor celeridad en la gestión de los reclamos y más eficiencia a la hora de prestar el servicio. La unión de tecnologías lumínicas led con tecnologías de comunicación permite avanzar en soluciones que facilitan y optimizan la gestión del servicio de alumbrado público: un sistema de telegestión constituye una herramienta de control y supervisión para obtener datos e información en tiempo real sobre el comportamiento y la operatividad de cada luminaria, la detección temprana de posibles fallas (adelantándose al reclamo o la consulta del vecino en el 147), el horario de encendido, apagado y su consumo. Desde el municipio se recuerda que por consultas o reclamos sobre temas o cuestiones vinculadas con el alumbrado público, comunicarse con MuniBot, al número 147 o a través del perfil digital en rosario.gob.ar

author: BOLU-OLU ESHO
title: IFAD/LIFE-ND Creates Network To Train, Encourage Women In Agric Chains In Ondo | Independent Newspaper Nigeria
text:
International Fund for Agricultural Development(IFAD) on Thursday created a network for Women in Agricultural chains in Ondo State with a view to training and encouraging them in their agribusinesses.
Ondo State Women in Agriculture Network In-Niger Delta(WIAN-ND) is the state chapter of the network created by the international organization.
Addressing the women who were invited to the programme in Akure, the state capital, the State Project Coordinator, Prince Ademola Olawale explained that the network is meant for building a chain of different professionals and personalities interested in agricultural chains
Represented by Mr. Akin Oluwalade, Environment and Climate Change specialist, IFAD-LIFE-ND, the SPC said the through the WIAN-ND, women would be enlightened on how to access agricultural inputs and funds to enhance their outputs.
In her address, Mrs. Akinyede Bola, the state Rural Institution and Gender Officer, IFAD-LIFE-ND, explained that the network is targeting at transforming rural economy for equal benefit of the citizenry irrespective of their gender.
The participants were, therefore, divided into four groups and brainstormed on different issues including discriminatory policies, gender violence, gap, security issues. limited access to education, training and technology, women access to land, lease, ownership and market structure, access to finance, credit and grant facilities.
Each group proffered solutions to some of the identified challenges being faced by women in agribusinesses.
In their submissions, the participants called on international organisations, particularly IFAD, to have special helpline in different countries through which women could lodge their complaints directly to agencies advocating for gender equality in different enterprises.
The participants were also enlightened by a senior staff from Bank of Agriculture(BOA) on how they can access loans from the bank to find their agribusinesses.
Likewise, a staffer of SMEDAN emphasized on how important for all farmers to register the names of the agric Enterprises to access loans and grants.
The executive of the WIAN-ND was elected by the participants to midwife the affairs of the network.

organizations.name: ondo state women in agriculture network in-niger delta

author: @Quadratin_Gro
title: Continúa la Gira del Juguete 2024 en Acapulco
text:
ACAPULCO, Gro., 7 de enero de 2024.- Más de mil juguetes fueron entregados a niñas y niños que se dieron cita en la “Casa de Día Rosita Salas” de Acapulco, la presidenta del Sistema DIF Guerrero, Liz Salgado Pineda continua con la Gira del Juguete 2024, llevando alegría a lugares con mayor índice de vulnerabilidad.
De acuerdo con un boletín, este encuentro enmarcó las celebraciones del Día de Reyes en Acapulco. Niñas y niños, recibieron juguetes de manos de los Reyes Magos, consolidando la visión de un Guerrero lleno de esperanza.
La jornada de diversión con juegos inflables, concursos, y un vibrante show que mantuvo a niñas, niños y adultos entretenidos, la presidenta del DIF Estatal, Liz Salgado Pineda, destacó la importancia de eventos que fomentan la unidad y la felicidad familiar, además, reconoció la fortaleza y resiliencia de las familias acapulqueñas ante los retos enmarcados por el huracán Otis.
Liz Salgado agregó que estos eventos se logran gracias al apoyo de la gobernadora Evelyn Salgado Pineda, resaltando el compromiso del gobierno del estado en llevar alegría a las familias guerrerenses. La jornada incluyó también comida, dulces y concursos para el disfrute de los asistentes, quienes mostraron su agradecimiento por este evento.
Liz Salgado Pineda, afirmó que el gobierno del estado y el Sistema DIF Guerrero mantienen su compromiso de seguir llevando eventos de calidad a las localidades del estado, promoviendo la unión familiar y la felicidad de la niñez guerrerense.

author: Contributing Editor
title: Firefighters Rescue 31 Workers from Collapsed Tunnel in Wilmington
text:
An investigation is underway Thursday after Los Angeles Fire Department rescue crews freed 31 workers trapped in Wilmington after a 18-foot tunnel collapsed.
More than 100 firefighters — including Urban Search and Rescue team members specially trained and certified to handle confined-space tunnel operations — were dispatched to the 1700 block of North Figueroa Street shortly before 8 p.m Wednesday, according to the Los Angeles Fire Department.
The 31 workers, who were boring a tunnel for the Los Angeles County Sanitation Districts at the time of the collapse, were rescued with no visible injuries at around 9:45 p.m. Wednesday.
They managed to climb over a pile of loose soil, estimated to be 12 to 15 feet tall, with considerable effort, said Brian Humphrey, a spokesman with the LAFD.
They were able to reach several coworkers on the other side of the collapse and were taken in groups by a tunnel vehicle to the entry point, which is more than five miles away.
Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass said when she heard about the collapse, she expected to find “tragedy- but instead, we found victory.”
It was unclear what caused the tunnel to collapse.
Twenty-seven workers removed from the tunnel are being medically evaluated by LAFD paramedics at the scene, Humphrey said.
“When I heard about this partial collapse, I rushed over fearing the worst,” Los Angeles County Supervisor Janice Hahn, whose Fourth District, includes Wilmington, said on social media. “But we are so blessed tonight that all these men made it out safely”
Hahn is also a member of the sanitation districts’ Board of Directors.
“LAFD has just reported that all workers who were trapped in the tunnel in Wilmington are now out and accounted for,” Bass added. “I just spoke with many of the workers who were trapped. Thank you to all of our brave first responders who acted immediately. You are L.A.’s true heroes.”
The 18-foot diameter excavation site was under construction for municipal wastewater management, which will serve five million people in the Los Angeles Basin, NBC4 reported.
“Tonight, I am in Wilmington with Mayor Bass, L.A. Police Chief McDonnell and L.A. Fire Chief [Ronnie] VIllanueva and multiple emergency staff at the site of the Clearwater Project after reports of a tunnel collapse with multiple personnel in the tunnel,” .said Councilman Tim McOsker, who also represents Wilmington. “I am relieved to report that all 31 individuals working the shift have been accounted for are safe. I am grateful for the rapid response of our L.A. City Fire Department, which deployed over 100 personnel, including the Urban Search and Rescue teams.”
The incident commander requested that helicopters from television stations be no closer than one mile from the intersection of Figueroa Street and Lomita Boulevard because excessive noise from the helicopters above the rescue site was interfering with the ability of rescue personnel to effectively communicate face-to-face or via radio at ground level.
NBC 4 reported the sanitation project was slated to be completed by the end of the year, but Michael Chee, a spokesman with Los Angeles County Sanitation Districts, said all construction on the tunnel will be halted pending an investigation.

author: Metro Transfer News Reporter
title: Thierry Henry hails Arsenal transfer target Dominic Solanke
text:
Thierry Henry has hailed Arsenal transfer target Dominic Solanke amid his glowing form for AFC Bournemouth this season in the Premier League.
Arsenal news, exclusives and analysis
Privacy Policy https://policies.google.com/privacyand Terms of Serviceapply.
Mikel Arteta
will reportedly push for Arsenal to sign Solanke in the January transfer window if they miss out on Ivan Toney.
The 26-year-old former Chelsea and Liverpool star has registered 12 goals across 18 top-flight matches this term – with only Erling Haaland having scored more.
With
Arsenal set to miss out on a deal for Brentford’s Toney, they could now look to snatch Solanke from the Cherries if they are willing to do business.
Following Arsenal’s 2-0 defeat to West Ham on Thursday night,
in which Henry called out struggling forward Gabriel Jesus, the Arsenal legend spoke in glowing terms about Solanke, who has been capped once by England.
Asked to name a player who has impressed him in the Premier League this season, Henry told Amazon Prime: ‘Dominic Solanke, the way he is playing at Bournemouth.
‘Not only him, the team is doing extremely well, but we have been waiting for him to be that player.
‘It guess it was a bit too much when he was younger. But what he is doing right now is brilliant.
I am happy for him because he did struggle for a little bit. Now he is looking good.’
Solanke only signed a new deal with Bournemouth in September, committing himself to the south coast club until 2027.

author: Paul Giannamore
title: Jefferson County Prosecutor's Office relocation essential due to flooding concerns
text:
JEFFERSON COUNTY, Ohio — Jefferson County commissioners are taking steps to address the persistent flooding at the prosecutor's office in the Jefferson County Justice Center.
The commissioners have agreed to seek proposals to relocate the office.
"With the long-range plan, once we get them moved out, we get in, get the right people, contractors. Let's really dig in to see if we can have a resolution to fix the issues they have, and then long-term, have that area where we could make it available to either other governmental entities or who knows," Commissioner Tony Morelli said.
Morelli emphasized that the office cannot be used in its current state due to the intermittent flooding.

author: TudoCelular.com
title: ROG Astral GeForce RTX 5090 OC Edition: placa da ASUS quebra seis recordes de overclock
text:
A placa de vídeo ROG Astral GeForce RTX™ 5090 OC Edition da ASUS quebrou quatro recordes mundiais em overclock e dois primeiros lugares globais em 3DMark Port Royal, 3DMark Fire Strike Extreme, 3DMark Time Spy Extreme, UNIGINE Superposition 1080P Xtreme, UNIGINE Superposition 8K Optimized e GPUPI v3.3 32B.
Em geral, essa novidade foi anunciada pela própria companhia sobre o seu modelo de GPU que faz parte de uma família de componentes que prometem atingir uma velocidade de clock de 2580 MHz. Na parte de design, a variante vem com quatro ventoinhas e uma almofada térmica para um melhor gerenciamento do calor.
Vale destacar que o produto também tem uma câmara de vapor, que serve como uma camada adicional de proteção para manter a placa de vídeo funcionando com todo o seu poder. Do mesmo modo, a ASUS diz que o componente possui fornecimento de energia premium para garantir performance estável e confiável para o produto em termos de energia.
Além de ter uma versão da GeForce RTX 5090, esse equipamento vem com um recurso exclusivo desbloqueado dentro do aplicativo para desktop GPU Tweak III. Chamado de Power Detector+, ele promete detectar anomalias em qualquer um dos 12 pinos de energia do cabo 12VHPWR ou 12V-2x6 conectado à placa.
Caso uma falha seja encontrada, a pessoa é notificada de que o cabo deve ser reconectado. O produto ainda vem com 32GB de VRAM GDDR7.
Disponibilidade
Segundo informado pela companhia, o modelo ainda não está disponível no Brasil, mas deve chegar em breve às lojas. O preço, por sua vez, não foi revelado. Por fim, veja aos detalhes do mouse anunciado pela empresa que emite fragrâncias no ambiente e o lançamento do notebook Vivobook S 14 no mercado nacional.

author: Rhonna Morala
title: Zelensky’s Drone Vision to Produce a Million ‘Kamikaze’ Drones
text:
Unveiling Ukraine’s Groundbreaking Strategy
Ukraine’s President Zelensky has unveiled a groundbreaking strategy for the year 2024, aiming to propel the nation into the forefront of drone warfare. This ambitious plan involves the production of an astounding one million ‘suicide drones,’ officially known as loitering munitions. These unmanned aerial vehicles, recognized as a technological and tactical revolution, have emerged as a key player in modern warfare.
Rapid Production Surge
Since the onset of Russia’s renewed invasion in 2022, Ukraine has demonstrated a remarkable surge in drone production. Minister Oleksandr Kamyshin proudly asserts the production of “more than 50,000 FPV drones” in December alone, This signals a substantial commitment to advancing its unmanned capabilities.
Read More:
Analyzing ATF’s Proposed Firearm Sales Rule and NRA’s Concerns
Diverse Drone Portfolio
Looking ahead to 2024, Ukraine’s drone production portfolio is set to diversify significantly. In addition to the staggering goal of manufacturing over a million ‘kamikaze’ drones, plans include the production of more than 10,000 medium-range attack drones and 1,000+ long-range drones. This comprehensive approach showcases Ukraine’s intent to cover various operational requirements.
First Person View (FPV) Drones
At the heart of this drone revolution are the First Person View (FPV) drones, which have become a defining element in the conflict. These agile and cost-effective unmanned vehicles have flooded social media, showcasing their prowess through videos capturing successful attacks from both Ukrainian and opposing forces.
FPV Drone Setup
The typical FPV drone setup involves a lightweight commercial hobbyist drone affixed to small munitions. The pilot, equipped with live video goggles, gains a ‘first-person’ perspective during the drone’s mission, offering a unique and immersive experience.
Read More:
Republicans Deny Senate a Ukraine and Israel Aid Deal Before Christmas
Affordability and Asymmetry
Emphasizing the affordability factor, Ukrainian authorities highlight that these drones cost only a few thousand dollars each. This cost-effective approach underscores the asymmetrical nature of their development, standing in stark contrast to the high expenses associated with traditional weapon systems.
Strategic Significance
Newsweek has lauded these drones as a “game-changer” and a “tech revolution,” reflecting their strategic importance in the evolving landscape of warfare. Government officials describe them as occasionally more efficient than artillery, underscoring their potential to reshape military strategies.
Drone Pilot Training
A pivotal aspect of this drone-centric approach is the extensive training of drone pilots. Ukraine claims to be producing thousands of skilled drone operators through private schools across the country. The operational synergy between FPV and photography drones is vital for effective reconnaissance and targeting.
Also Read:
New York’s Groundbreaking Gun Law Ruling: A Game-Changer for Public Safety!
Operational Dynamics
Mastering FPV drones requires skilled pilots, and intriguingly, individuals with experience in computer games, particularly PlayStation, demonstrate superior performance. The operational dynamics involve a synchronized effort between FPV and photography drones, providing a multi-faceted approach to intelligence gathering.
Effectiveness in Warfare
Despite their undeniable effectiveness, these drones contribute to a challenging stalemate in the ongoing conflict. General Valery Zaluzhny acknowledges the limitations imposed by the saturation of battlefield intelligence, eroding the element of surprise in military assaults.
Impact on Conflict Dynamics
FPV drones have undeniably altered the dynamics of warfare, offering real-time intelligence and precision targeting. The evolving nature of the conflict reflects both the challenges and opportunities presented by the integration of drone technology into military strategies.
Read Next:
Republicans slam Washington Post op-ed which suggested ‘open rebellion
Global Implications
Ukraine’s ambitious drone production plan sets a global precedent, signaling a transformative shift toward the widespread integration of unmanned systems in modern warfare. The international community keenly observes these developments, recognizing the profound implications for global security and conflict resolution.
Technologically Advanced Nation
President Zelensky’s vision for a million ‘suicide drones’ underscores Ukraine’s unwavering commitment to technological advancements in defense. As drones assume an increasingly central role in warfare, their impact on conflict dynamics and global security remains a subject of international scrutiny and concern.
